class.name: CircleShape2D
class.brief_description: A 2D circle shape used for physics collision.
class.description: A 2D circle shape, intended for use in physics. Usually used to provide a shape for a [CollisionShape2D]. [b]Performance:[/b] [CircleShape2D] is fast to check collisions against. It is faster than [RectangleShape2D] and [CapsuleShape2D].
